snippet.title: MAV Gameplay Trailer ► Rebellion (Indie Mech Game)
snippet.description:
MAV gameplay trailer featuring both singleplayer, multiplayer, and AI matches. 

Join the Revolution!

M.A.V. - Modular Assault Vehicle is a new indie mech game by Bombdog studios inspired to be a New Chromehounds PC spiritual sequel. "Chromehounds 2" never came, so we're getting something even better with unlimited custom built mechs and machine learning AI.

Links: 
https://bombdogstudios.com/blog/ (multiplayer campaign Info)
Try MAV FREE and get bonus signup rewards using my link! http://bit.ly/MAVBombdogStudios
Twitter: http://bit.ly/TwitterRustEShacky 
Twitch: https://bit.ly/TwitchRustyShacky
Discord: https://bit.ly/MAVDiscord
